entry.source: {F812}Demonoid man\0{F813,1,415204}PK... Bukuroooo! O-Oh, I was just talking{F801}to myself. It's not like I'm a clown or{F801}anything.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demonoid woman\0{F813,1,419412}Ikebukuro's gotten pretty messed up...{F801}But this is still Japan after all.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The shutter is closed. It doesn't seem{F801}that it will open.{F801}
